title: Lag...
body:
Cuando estoy en Ranked se me esta trancando mucho el juego cuando vamos a seleccionar champions y me penalisan por que no puedo seleccionar mi champion y solo me pasa en Ranked.... 

When I am in Ranked I freeze when selecting a champion and I can't select it so I accidentally dodge and get penalized.. it only happens in ranked

replies.body: This could be happening for a few reasons, the most common being the auto-enabling of the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) after a recent windows update.  The bar has been causing freezing issues for some players, so disabling that may help!  If the issue continues, then you may be having other network issues staying connected during champion select, and getting kicked out.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get that fixed.  Hope that helps!

I tried what you suggested and it still happening and its ONLY in ranked too, I could play a regular game and even draft normal and it doesn't happen, only in ranked and the penalties are ridiculous I have to wait yet ANOTHER half hour, is there a way to contact Riot's help directly?
